title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: In the Java perspective, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences->Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification". The build menu option still appears in the Java popup menus. This behavior is incorrect.
EB: In the Java perspective, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu should only be enabled if the user has not enabled the automatic build option in Preferences->Workbench.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Go to the Java perspective. 
2. Open the context-sensitive popup menu. 
3. Verify that the "Build" action is always enabled. 
4. Go to Preferences->Workbench. 
5. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification". 
6. Open the context-sensitive popup menu again and verify that the "Build" action is disabled if the automatic build option is enabled.
